data.title: Relaxation Ambient Meditation New Age Music
data.meta_description: Ambient Music is intended to induce calm and a space to think. Ambient, a genre of instrumental music that focuses on sound patterns more than melodic form and is used to create a certain atmosphere or state of mind...
